heading: HB03266
0: AN ACT CONVERTING EASTERN VISAYAS REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER-VILLABA EXTENSION (EVRM-VILLABA EXTENSION) IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF VILLABA, PROVINCE OF LEYTE, TO A TERTIARY HOSPITAL AND TO INCREASE ITS BED CAPACITY FROM TWENTY-FIVE (25) BEDS TO TWO HUNDRED (200) BEDS, UPGRADING THE SERVICE, FACILITIES AND PROFESSIONAL HEALTH CARE THEREIN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-08-06
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03266
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONVERTING EASTERN VISAYAS REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER-VILLABA EXTENSION (EVRM-VILLABA EXTENSION) IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF VILLABA, PROVINCE OF LEYTE, TO A TERTIARY HOSPITAL AND TO INCREASE ITS BED CAPACITY FROM TWENTY-FIVE (25) BEDS TO TWO HUNDRED (200) BEDS, UPGRADING THE SERVICE, FACILITIES AND PROFESSIONAL HEALTH CARE THEREIN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VELOSO, VICENTE III "CHING" S.E.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-31
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
